Interface Node

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphElement, Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataNode, ReadOnlyDataNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataNodeImpl, NodeAdapter, ReadOnlyDataNodeImpl, SimpleNodeImpl

    public interface Node
extends GraphElement
    The basic features any Node in any graph should have

      • addEdge

        boolean addEdge(Edge edge)
        Adds an edge to this Node, in the proper direction list ONLY IF edge.startNode() or edge.endNode() equals this Node. Otherwise, nothing is inserted.
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge to add
        Returns:
        true if edge was successfully added

        CAUTION: does not update the Edge start/end nodes
